page.title: 19Employment in the Stone Area
page.content: Many of the people in our area work in Stoke-on-Trent, Stafford or at the Stone Business Park.These people are employed in areas such as the pottery industry, tyre manufacture, glass making, coal mining, computers, education and medicine.(There are large hospitals in Stafford and Stoke-on-Trent which is famous for the pottery industry.) In the area of land covered by our survey, employment is provided by G.E.C. Measurements who make instruments for electrical measurement, Doulton Industrial Products who make electrical insulators, the Trent Geriatric Hospital, shops, offices, hotels, schools, etc. Most land in the area is used for dairy farming and this gives employment to some of the people.
